title: looking for managers and coaches for my 2 high diamond to chall teams (Blue Side and Red Side)
body: looking for managers and coaches for my 2 high diamond to chall teams (Blue Side and Red Side) are the names and we are looking to improve all the players as much as possible i am the manager but am looking to share the load of it with someone else and coaches to watch over vods and be there in the post game discussion after games of scrims or tournaments

replies.body: Your really going to waste irl money for a coach on a diamond team ?
did i say i was gonna pay for them?? there is a lot of people willing to do it for free to improve on coaching :)
